name: Waystation
description:
Waystation is a short conversation between Albert and Joseph. Talk about old friends, regrets, being left behind, and the long road ahead. There's a way out, if you want it.

This is a a fan-game made to explore the liminal place where the world of "Kentucky Route Zero" meets "Twin Peaks: The Return." Although canon knowledge is encouraged, it is entirely possible to play without knowledge of either media. You get the meaning you bring to it.

The story, characters, and world of Kentucky Route Zero and Twin Peaks belong to their respective creators. I'd never used Unity before making this game, so any errors/bugs are here to stay. It's been a steep learning curve! 

Estimated 10 min runtime.

CW: Instance of slowly pulsing/strobing light. 

CONTROLS:

A+D KEYS to move. 

CLICK to interact.

MADE FOR: laughingpineapple, babe_without_the_arms.
